exceptions.exn: In environment T : UniformSpace x : T P : T -> Prop H : ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) Unable to unify "~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y))" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y".
The reference H0 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros T x P H. unfold locally. intros H0. apply H. intros eps. apply H0.
